content: 🔐 Lost your phone? FINDERR can help! Our revolutionary app displays your emergency contact info on your locked screen. Join our beta test today! #PhoneSecurity #FINDERR #Android

🔔 SMS Triggers: Send 'FINDERR_ON' to activate emergency mode remotely. Send 'FINDERR_OFF' to restore. Simple commands, powerful protection. #SMSTriggers #RemoteControl
